introduction: In 1930 a ship was launched. It's job was to serve as a lighthouse ship. In 1947 the ship became a transport vessel for a group of smugglers. In 1950, after murdering a many of kids and women, with Nola Alvah being among them. Nola was a voodoo princess, known to have great powers from the dark side. Before her untimely death, at the hands of her captures, she cursed the ships owners and crew, for all times. The crew and it's smugglers were never seen again. In 1968, the boat was purchased again, the owner was never found. The boat sat for 40 years later. With the ships ghost stories now running rampant, in 2008, another group purchased the ship, only to never be heard from again. In 2019, a wealthy man purchase the ship. He then hires a reality ghost hunting team to rid the ship of any spirits, good or bad. So the group of 9 ghost hunters, down on luck and needed the payday takes the job. After getting on the ship the team quickly find out where Nola has been, all this years, on her ship.
